card.name: Chara, LV Incarnate
card.text: Judgment. (Your LV starts at 1. It increases whenever a creature an opponent control dies.) At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices X creatures, where X is your LV. --- (Front): But Nobody Came.

card.name: The Delta Rune
card.text: Enchant permanent When this Aura enters, draw two cards. As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it gets +1/+1 and has flying and lifelink. As long as enchanted permanent is an Equipment, it has "Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has flying and lifelink."

card.name: Prank Telescope
card.text: Schadenfreude — Whenever a creature you control is dealt damage, you gain that much life. {R}, {T}: This artifact deals 1 damage to target creature you control.

card.name: Muffet, Vicious Chef
card.text: Affinity for Food and Spiders (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Food and Spider you control.) Reach Noncreature foods you control are 2/1 Spider creatures in addition to their other types, and they have reach.

card.name: Strange Sculpting
card.text: Draw a card for each kind of counter among permanents you control.

card.name: Despite Everything...
card.text: Enchant creature ...It's Still You. — Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature and token you control.

card.name: Clamoring Fans
card.text: Whenever a legendary creature you control enters or attacks, create a 2/2 green Citizen creature token.

card.name: Undyne's Command
card.text: Choose two: • Return target nonland, noncreature permanent to its owner's hand. • Counter target creature spell. • Destroy target creature with power 3 or less. • You draw a card and lose 1 life.

card.name: Mettaton, Arisen Despot
card.text: Menace Whenever Mettaton deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that player's library. If it's a land card, Mettaton deals 3 damage to defending player. Otherwise, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. Whenever you cast a spell you don't own, draw cards equal to its mana value.

card.name: Queen Alphys
card.text: Judgment. (Your LV starts at 1. It increases whenever a creature an opponent control dies.) Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, if your LV is 5 or higher, Queen Alphys deals 2 damage to each opponent. If your LV is 9 or higher, she deals damage equal to her power instead.

card.name: Chara, the Fallen Human
card.text: Haste Whenever Chara attacks, they deal 3 damage to target Human. (If Chara is the only Human on the battlefield, they will deal damage to themself.) {5}: Chara attacks this turn if able. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Commune with Trash
card.text: Mill three cards. If a creature card was milled this way, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. If a noncreature, nonland card was milled this way, draw a card.

card.name: Gerson, Hammer of Justice
card.text: Trample, haste Judgment. (Your LV starts at 1. It increases whenever a creature an opponent control dies.) As long as you have LV 3 or less, Gerson has hexproof.
